The job cuts announced Tuesday amount to 5 percent of the automaker's North American salaried workforce and will take effect by October 1. They come in addition to a reduction of 1,000 salaried positions announced in April, Ford announced.

This is actually something Ford has been considering for a while.
 
 Ford NA will concentrate on engineering and development of truck and truck based products.
 
 Ford Europe (Including Volvo) and Mazda will do the engineering for automobiles.
